ygData.subject: Re: FULL LIST OF NEW ITEMS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... since we cant wear mesh, woven is the best =) ... good question. try and find one of them eluzive rare skull staves, or find the quest in S. Ro where you
ygData.messageBody:
>1) Whats the best armor fer us Woven or Mesh?

since we cant wear mesh, woven is the best =)

>2) What's the best 1h weapon? I got teh skull and can't use the totem now..

good question. try and find one of them eluzive rare skull staves, or find
the quest in S. Ro where you can supposedly take a runed staff and the
skull, pay a guy 30gp and have him make you a skull staff...

>3)Am i the only one that stay broke? I have never had more than 20pp.If not
>whats the trick to make.

what's yer level? i made 60 plat in a night at the aviak village and paw in
s. karana.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
